mean_en: having or showing hatred and a desire to harm somebody or hurt their feelings; (of software or computer code) intended to damage somebody's computer or data files
sentence: He took malicious pleasure in watching the dog being tortured.
sentence_trans: 他怀着恶意的愉悦看着那只狗被折磨。
word_etyma: malic诽谤 + ious有……的 → malicious恶意的
